meanings.definition: Outlined or filled in with a dark color against a lighter background.
meanings.sent1: The silhouetted tree looked spooky against the moonlit sky.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a silhouetted profile of the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The silhouetted cat seemed like a mysterious shadow in the night.
meanings.sent4: Her silhouetted figure stood out boldly against the bright sunset.
meanings.sent5: The silhouetted mountain range appeared majestic in the distance.

meanings.definition: To show as a dark shape or figure against a light background.
meanings.sent1: The dancer silhouetted against the stage curtain.
meanings.sent2: The branches silhouetted against the setting sun.
meanings.sent3: The chef silhouetted the vegetables on the cutting board.
meanings.sent4: The bird silhouetted against the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The building was silhouetted by the bright streetlights.
